name: Poor Devil
skill: Restores 947/1127 HP to all allies and cures them of all negative status effects.
ability: At the start of the final wave, all foes take moderately more damage.
Slightly increases damage dealt by skill targets.

additional_data.description: A spirit that latches onto people and drags them into poverty. Actually, what he really does is reverse wealth, not just from rich to poor but also from poor to rich. However, since losers tend to be louder than winnders, everyone knows him as the god of bad luck and poverty. This has weakened his ability to bring wealth, whereas taking it all away comes to him easily.

main: "You can also turn disaster into fortune, you know..."
skill: "What goes around comes around—good or bad!"
summon: "Don't worry, I won't let my powers affect you too much."
